name: 2D Platformer Game (Lord_Hammad)
description:
I have created two new levels from scratch. I have also created my own custom enemy (in black color). 

My game levels include: 
> Moving Platforms
> Enemies - Basic Static Enemies, Walking Enemies, Smart Walking Enemies and Ultra Smart Walking Enemies
> Collectibles - Extra Life, Full Heal Pickup, Score and Keys
> 4 Different Tile Types
> Acid
